ceoMessage.title: CEO Message
ceoMessage.message1: We provide optimal IT solutions tailored to each customer's individual needs.
ceoMessage.message2: If you are interested in high-quality, low-cost systems provided by an elementary school student CEO, please feel free to contact us.

notice.title: Important Notice
notice.content: As this is operated by an elementary school student CEO, responses may be delayed on weekdays due to school commitments.
